wordpressPost.title: Øya present Norwegian bands at SXSW
wordpressPost.content:
On Friday 16th of March The Øya festival and Music Export Norway present three Norwegian bands as part of Filter Magazine’s program at  South By Southwest (SXSW) in Austin, Texas. Philco Fiction, Razika and Team We will perform for music lovers, media and industry people from almost the entire globe. This will be an excellent opportunity for the three Norwegian bands.

Filter Magazine’s Showdown at Cedar Street is a three-day event at the world’s largest festval for new music. SXSW is perhaps the most important showcase for aspiring artists. At the same stage as the three Norwegian bands, you can also see Kaizer Chiefs, Keane, Built To Spill, Band Of Skulls, Of Monsters and Men and Ed Sheeran during SXSW.

Free BBQ from 11am
The event is supported by the Norwegian Embassy in Washington and Consulate General in Houston.

 

http://teamme.no/

http://www.myspace.com/razika

http://philcofiction.com/

http://filtermagazine.com/index.php/news/entry/american_rag_presents_filter_magazines_2012_sxsw_showdown_at_cedar_st

messages.newsletter.consentLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions
messages.newsletter.consentText:
Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
